FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: An elvish duel is a thing of beauty: the warriors’ grace, the crash of steel, then the artful spray of blood.

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Whenever another nontoken Elf is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: if (TriggerObject() ~= Object() and TriggerObject():GetSubType():Test( CREATURE_TYPE_ELF ) ~= 0 and TriggerObject():GetOwner() == EffectController() and TriggerObject():IsToken() == 0) then return true else return false end
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local token_count = 1 if token_count > 0 then MTG():PutTokensIntoPlay( "TOKEN_ELF_WARRIOR_1_1_280316", token_count, EffectController() ) end
